metatags.og:title: Stuck on ID.me verification for NY unemployment - can't find ID scan section - Claimyr
metatags.og:description: I just went through this last week. The ID scan option doesn't show up until after you've entered your Social Security number. After that, you should see a screen that gives you options to verify your identity - one should say something like 'Upload ID documents' or 'Verify with photo ID'. Are you getting to that part?
